title: Adani Group wants a slice of India's payments and e-commerce pie: Report
description: India's Adani Group is seeking a licence to operate on the public digital payments network and is in talks with banks for a co-branded credit card. The conglomerate also plans to offer online shopping via the govt-backed Open Network for Digital Commerce (ONDC), according to the Financial Times.
